metadata.name: Amāre
metadata.description:
“You’ve got the wrong person, I was on my way home from work - my name is Kumaru, I don’t know who you’re talking about!” he cried as they detained him in what was a clear case of mistaken identity. 

Fikile, his fiancée, keeps this photograph and looks at it with the hope that their appeal case will be successful. It’s, at its core, a moving doomed love story about two people stuck in an unfair situation they can’t escape.

Amāre ; To love.
